author: bmbouter
msg: This version now has working capture code.  Creating a new image version, or creating a derivative image now works.

author: bmbouter
msg: Added an OS check when the $forimaging flag is set to 1.  This new version ensures the username checked for login is "Administrator" for windows only, and will use the VCL user's username otherwise.

author: hlship
msg: TAP5-92: Add support for server-side only comments

msg: HADOOP-5317. Provide documentation for LazyOutput Feature. (Jothi Padmanabhan via johan)
